1.0.name: wordpress/evergreen-post-tweeter
1.0.description:
Evergreen Post Tweeter enables you to automatically and periodically tweet out links to old posts based upon a tag or tags.

Rather than tweet out any and all of your old posts, Evergreen Post Tweeter enables you to selectively tweet out only those posts that are still relevant and "evergreen." Just create a custom tag for all of your best posts (like "Evergreen"), enable the plugin to tweet out posts with that tag and Evergreen Post Tweeter will do the rest!

Your Twitter followers will thank you for exposing them to more of your great content and you will get even more traffic to your site! I recently boosted Twitter referrals to my site by approximately 250% with Evergreen Post Tweeter. Enjoy!

Features:

  • Tweet out posts and/or pages
  • Add additional text to the tweet
  • Choose from a selection of URL shorteners
  • Set the time between each tweet
  • Set minimum/maximum post ages
  • Select multiple tags for inclusion
